name: Kiralynoi Pawn Megnyitas
short_description: The most nepszeru opening move, immediately claiming central space and opening lines for the vezer and futo.

name: Vezeri Pawn Megnyitas
short_description: A classical central advance leading to strategiai and positional battles.

name: RĂ©ti Megnyitas
short_description: A hypermodern move emphasizing rugalmas fejlodes and indirect central kontroll.

name: Kiralynoi Fianchetto Megnyitas
short_description: Prepares to fianchetto the futo on g2 for long diagonal kontroll.

name: Larsen's Megnyitas
short_description: Prepares Bb2 and indirect nyomas on the center.

name: Saragossa Megnyitas
short_description: A quiet move preparing d4 and rugalmas gyalog structures.

name: Van't Kruijs Megnyitas
short_description: A modest central preparation move leading to rugalmas fejlodes.

name: Amar Megnyitas
short_description: A rare knight move aiming for surprise and unconventional play.

name: Dunst Megnyitas
short_description: A rugalmas knight fejlodes that can transpose into many mainstream openings.

name: Knight to the Rim (Na3)
short_description: An uncommon knight move to the edge, generally considered suboptimal but playable.

name: Polish Megnyitas (Sokolsky)
short_description: An agressziv flank gyalog thrust aiming to kontroll c5 and disrupt central plans.

name: Grob Megnyitas
short_description: A highly unorthodox and risky opening weakening the kiralyszarny.

name: Clemenz Megnyitas
short_description: A waiting move that prevents Bg4 and prepares potential g4 expansion.

name: Desprez Megnyitas
short_description: A flank gyalog thrust aiming for early kiralyszarny space.

name: Barnes Megnyitas
short_description: A very rare and weakening move that prepares e4 but exposes the kiraly.

name: Ware Megnyitas
short_description: A flank gyalog push aimed at vezeroldal expansion.

name: Anderssen's Megnyitas
short_description: A slow waiting move preparing b4 and limiting opponent piece activity.

name: Vezeri Pawn One Step
short_description: A restrained central move keeping options rugalmas.

name: Sicilian Vedelem: Alapin Valtozat
short_description: A practical anti-Sicilian where White builds a broad center and avoids heavy open-Sicilian theory.

name: Vezeri Indian Vedelem
short_description: A rugalmas Indian setup where Black controls central dark squares and develops harmoniously.

name: Bogo-Indian Vedelem
short_description: A practical Indian defense using an early check to shape White's setup and reduce theory load.

name: Four Knights Jatek
long_algebraic_notation: 1. e2-e4 e7-e5 2. Ng1-f3 Nb8-c6 3. Nb1-c3 Ng8-f6
short_description: A natural fejlodes opening that can stay positional or transpose into sharper central lines.

name: Vezeri Gambit Elutasitva: Orthodox Vedelem
short_description: A classical QGD framework centered on robust fejlodes and strategiai central tension.

name: Ruy Lopez: Closed Vedelem
long_algebraic_notation: 1. e2-e4 e7-e5 2. Ng1-f3 Nb8-c6 3. Bf1-b5 a7-a6 4. Bb5-a4 Ng8-f6 5. O-O Bf8-e7
short_description: A cornerstone of classical opening theory featuring rich maneuvering and long strategiai plans.

name: Bongcloud Tamadas
short_description: A famous meme opening where White plays an early kiraly move, sacrificing castling rights for surprise value.

name: Bongcloud Tamadas: Double Bongcloud
short_description: A szimmetrikus meme line where both sides bring the kiraly out early, leading to chaotic and unserious play.

name: Crab Megnyitas
short_description: A flank-first meme setup where White expands both rook pawns while Black claims the center.

name: Halloween Gambit
long_algebraic_notation: 1. e2-e4 e7-e5 2. Ng1-f3 Nb8-c6 3. Nb1-c3 Ng8-f6 4. Nf3xe5
short_description: A spooky and dubious online favorite where White sacs a knight for rapid gyalog expansion and kezdemenyezes.

name: Tennison Gambit
short_description: A tricky gambit often used in blitz and meme content to lure early taktikai mistakes from Black.

name: Botez Gambit
short_description: A meme line where White grabs e5 too early and can lose the vezer immediately.

name: Cramling Cow Megnyitas
short_description: The Cow is a low-theory setup system where White aims for pawns on d3/e3 and knights on b3/g3 before challenging the center. It is easy to play and practical, but objectively concedes a slight advantage and costs extra tempi.
